1.content:

"Well around here, you will learn to develop this ability. If you don't, well, you'll "help" someone else develop theirs. That's right, there is no cafeteria at this school, you will survive completely on a diet of other people."

Now THAT has people gasping. As you look around, you see that most of the people are panicked. Some of them seemed to have a devilishly happy look on their face, but for the most part they were freaking out. You weren't quite sure which category you fit in yet.

The voice continued to explain a few things about the school, most notably that it was pretty much inescapable, and that the vore-centric classes were not required. The only requirement to graduate the school was for you to survive for a certain amount of time, which he did not specify.

You finally get up off the cot you had been sitting on since you awoke, and stretched your body. By the way, what kind of body do you have?

info.brief_description: You are forced into a school where the only food is the other students.
info.description:
You are Alex, a 19 year old boy or girl, who is kidnapped one day and forced into a secret school for vores. The aim of this school is to find the people with the best vore capabilities and then use them for some unknown purpose. There is no cafeteria at the school and the students are not allowed to leave, so their only option is to eat each other for survival. There are classes at the school, but the students are not required to take them. They are there to help the students develope their vore skills, but if you prefer to learn by doing, by all means do so.

Rules:
COCKVORE, UNBIRTH, AND BREAST VORE ARE NOW ALLOWED IN ADDITION TO ORAL!

Regression in the case of unbirth is not allowed, since no one under 18 is allowed in the school. Unbirthees may be let out harmlessly, absorbed into the unbirther, or melted into juices and squirted back out. The same options apply to cockvore and breastvore.

Alex MUST eat in order to survive. He/she is capable of letting their meals out, but they do not count as a meal unless they digest them. Cockvore, unbirth, and breast vore do not count as a meal unless the prey is absorbed, but it can count as a meal if Alex swallows the cum/juices/milk produced by someone else through these types of vore.

Students may be between the ages of 18 and 25, and they all have vore abilities to some degree.

Digested/melted students do not come back or reform in any way. The only way they survive being eaten is if they are let out before digestion.

Alex is only able to swallow 1 person at once at first, but this ability increases with time. The same applies for all types of vore.

Keep male/male vore to a minimum. It is allowed, but I'll start deleting chapters if it gets to be too common.

Sex is allowed and encouraged. No gay sex though please.

Lastly, try to use good grammar and spelling. No one-sentence chapters except in the case of "more options" chapters.

The school itself has almost no rules, the only ones it has are "survive", "No minors inside the school" and "don't try to leave" There are absolutely no other restrictions, even on clothing. The students often walk around nude, though this serves little purpose other than to make them more tempting targets! Those who try to leave usually end up getting eaten by the school's staff, or fed to other students as rewards.
